formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["alex.marketing@tritondefense.com"],"subject":"Technical Specifications – Cross-Departmental Project","body":"Hi Alex,

Thanks for sending over the latest figures and projections.

Below are the technical specifications from IT so that Marketing & IT stay aligned as we roll this out:

────────────────────────────────
1. Analytics Tool Stack
• Primary platform: Tableau Server v2022.1 running on the internal Kubernetes cluster
• Data warehouse: Snowflake (prod_wh) with 2-hour incremental loads managed by Fivetran
• Middleware/API: Internal API-Gateway endpoints  /v1/leads  &  /v1/campaign-stats  (JSON, OAuth 2.0)

2. Data Pipeline & Sources
• Source systems: Marketo, Salesforce CRM, Google Ads, Web-event logs
• ETL: Fivetran → raw schema → dbt transforms → analytics mart
• Dashboard refresh cadence: hourly (06:00–23:00 EST)

3. Security & Compliance (per IT’s latest guidance)
• Okta MFA required for all dashboard / API access
• Endpoint protection: CrowdStrike Falcon on all analyst laptops
• Encryption: TLS 1.2+ in transit, AES-256 at rest
• Vulnerability management: quarterly scans + monthly patch window
• Back-ups: nightly full + 15-min log shipping, 30-day retention, quarterly restore test
• PII handling: masking before export outside Snowflake

4. Environment & Support
• Environments:   DEV & UAT live now; PROD cut-over planned for 14 March
• Monitoring: Datadog with alert thresholds 75 % CPU / 80 % RAM
• SLA: critical incidents – response <1 h, resolution <4 h (business hours)

5. Immediate Next Steps
• Please review and confirm if any additional dimensions or metrics are required on your side so we can extend the data model before the freeze.
• Tentative joint sign-off meeting: Thu 24 Feb 10:00-11:00 EST – let me know if that works.

Let me know if anything needs more detail – happy to jump on a quick call.

Best,
Jane"}

formatted_items.content: Sent! Let me know if you need anything else.

final_output: Sent! Let me know if you need anything else.
